author: Ainy Cormac
description:
The Kinslayer by S.K Putt is a Norse-inspired fantasy novel that merges ancient lore and myth with fast-paced action. Right from the opening scene, The Kinslayer is laced with action and violence, and maintains a close and primal focus on its characters. Although epic, this is not a sweeping story full of tangents and lore-dumps; […]

The post REVIEW: The Kinslayer by S.K. Putt appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Kinslayer by S.K. Putt
